Package card

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
card.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents a normal Deck of Cards either loaded by the user or automatically generated (with 52 cards) This class contains an Array of Cards;
Author:
Eduardo Barata 99930, Andr√© Roque 86694

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck()
    Constructor for Deck, this constructor (with no arguments) will generate an ordered standard 52 card Deck.
    Deck(ArrayList<Card> d_)
    Constructor for Deck, this constructor (with an Array of cards provided in arguments) will generate a Deck with the passed cards in its arguments.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCard(Card add)
    Adds a specified Card to the current deck
    int
    deckSize()
    Returns the size of the deck (the number of remaining Cards in the deck)
    Card
    drawcard()
    Draws a Card from the top of the deck, returning it
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    Main function with the only propose being for test usage

    shuffle()
    Shuffles the deck

      public Deck()
      Constructor for Deck, this constructor (with no arguments) will generate an ordered standard 52 card Deck.

    • Deck

      public Deck(ArrayList<Card> d_)
      Constructor for Deck, this constructor (with an Array of cards provided in arguments) will generate a Deck with the passed cards in its arguments.
      Parameters:
      d_ - Array of Cards to place in the Deck
